caDomainId.description: Provided on GET response to indicate the CA Domain ID of this entry. [Optional] In POST verified against QueryParameter if present

status.description: GET only parameter, Ignored if supplied in POST

contentType.description: Captures the Quality mode related to encryption.  if not present default assumed for insert. if not present contentType is not affected for update.

sourceSecurities.description: Captures the source security mode related to encryption. if not present default assumed for insert. if not present sourceSecurity is not affected for update.

SCC_SourceParams.description: Captures the DTA specific CAS parameters of the source, if not present default assumed for insert. if not present SCC_SourceParams is not affected for update.

acRef.description: acRef generated by PKC for the source. only a GET parameter.  ignored if supplied on POST/PUT

extAcRefs.description: extAcRef supplied into PKC to prep up the ECMG for SCS query.  When extAcRef is supplied internal acRef will not be adminstered on ECMG for lookup.
